To complete most combat scenarios, you will need to lower an enemy's health to 0 before they do the same to you. To aid you in this, you have access to abilities that can damage enemies, prevent you from taking damage, and increase your stats.

Click the 'Non-ability Actions' dropdown, select 'View Fighter' and then click the matching button that will help you defeat the Practice Dummy
jeminiw used **Basic Attack** on Practice Dummy
